Four Stars
review:
Awesome looking watch. If you have a wrist of 6inch or lower this is the only
Fastrack watch that will fit in your wrist. Anything over case diameter of
40mm will be too big for your watch. I got it for 1965 during the Indian
festival offer. I gave it 4stars instead of 5 because of the following
reasons.  
Cons.....  
1\. Case is too thick for my liking.  
2\. In silent places it will make clicking noise of the second hand.  
3\. Can be slightly uncomfortable because of the weight.

I am very disappointed to receive a used product. There are no round holdings
for the product after the buckle. The belt have lost the top layer of it.  
I was very excited that it was delivered before I go home but all that
excitement was gone when there is no option to tie it to my hand atleast.

Fastrack Black Magic Analog Black Dial Men's Watch - NE3089SL05  
  
I am writing this review for the product: Fastrack Black Magic Analog Black
Dial Men's Watch - NE3089SL05. I had placed the order of this watch two days
ago and I am taking delivery of the watch today. The watch is an original
product and was delivered to me safely and on time as evidenced by the
enclosed images in this review. I am very pleased with this watch and I
recommend that this watch be bought by customers who are looking for quality
watches at an affordable price.

Yes it's a good looking watch. But when i opened the package i found that in
the guarantee certificate they have mentioned that it should be signed,filled
and stamped by authorized dealers but in my card it was blank. So what does
this mean??i need some clarifications. Hope i'll get it

Superb watch from Fastrack....i love it,elegant style,dial and strap.very much
satisfied with amazon delivery..it came on the third day itself with lot of
air pouches to prevent damage.i bought it a year ago and waited this long for
a review to know whether its really good or bad...guess what,its neither bad
nor good,its SUPERB and AWESOME.its completely water resistant..i have used it
roughly, but the glass have not got a scratch even when it fell hardly two-
three times. the strap is 100% leather and not much affected by water,but
remember not to soak the strap in water for long as it is leather.overall,i
love it and it is THE BEST.

Product dial is good but belt is verry thin. The last portion of belt is verry
thin and other other portion is perfect size. And end of the belt there are so
many wrinkles😁product shining is not good👎

Decent Watch.  
Build Quality Great.  
Casual But if belt changed with Black will also be fine.  
It's Display (dial) is roughly 4cm.  
Overall Pretty Nice in this Price Range with Black Dial.  
It needs very little shine on it while seeing time.

First of all thank u fastrack, Amazon & cloudtail..it's a wow factor watch..if
u have looking a dashing & handsome watch around 2k....go for it...this is a

watch is capable to set all types of wrist..once again thank u for this
amazing product..don't thik just go for it...

Shinning is very good,belt material is also best but few small as I expected

Genuine review of this Product
Four Stars
review:
It's a very sober and an elegant watch to wear. Definitely stands out thanks
to the beige band and the smartly designed dial. However, it does come with
few flaws; the dial feels a tad bit bulky and large for someone with a not so
big wrist. It's difficult to see the time under dull lighting as the needle is
silver and blends in with the black dial. Having said that, I think this is
the best watch I've purchased off late and will definitely recommend it for
the price. Feels very premium and a niche product.

just got it today...must say the design and elegance is top notch.Premium
design..Highly recommended for those who want to buy Fastrack watch.  
But i have given 4 star because i noticed that the warranty card is not signed
by the seller. I doubt if i get warranty with this .Else it is more that 5
star for me.Just loved it

Product is not much good. I thought that it is light weighted with small dial.
If so it was excellent. It is weighted and dial is medium. It is Ok that's
all. Amazon's notable experience is their customer service. It is the best
service in online shopping, no doubt. I am appreciating them. Thank you

This is the genuine review of this product.......  
The watch is comfortable to wear and the strap is sort of leather i would say

like about this watch is its thickness it is quite thick but don't get me
wrong although it is comfortable to wear and is not a deal breaker.....
Finally I wanna say that it is the perfect watch in this price range....the
delivery was also quite fast due to prime delivery....
